{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA6700 |revision= |upc=745883597956 |ean=4260184662647 |asin=B00IGQV5XQ |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/19/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA6700 |ic_id=3839A-EA6700 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708A0 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |fla1_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63DFA-H9C |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks (SiGe);SE2605L;;3;,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks (SiGe);SE5003L1;;3; |flags= |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=AdvancedTomato, DD-WRT, FreshTomato-ARM, Tomato (Shibby), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Smart Wi-Fi Router AC1750 HD Video Pro'''
Per the FCC photos... :"48SAB402.SGE" and "2012/12/17 G" is silkscreened ::on the (main, top) component side of the board. :The '''Cisco''' logo is silkscreened on the bottom of the board.
{{WiFiCert|WFA18397|10/11/2013}}
===Specifications=== *Device is using [[Broadcom]] BCM4708A0 (BCM4708A0KFEBG) *802.11ac Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM4360 is using three :[[Skyworks]] SE5003L1 5GHz Power Amplifier ICs. *802.11n Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM4331 is using three :[[Skyworks]] ''(SiGe)'' SE2605L 2.4GHz Power Amplifier [http://www.skyworksinc.com/uploads/documents/202438A.pdf ICs].
===News=== *[http://home.cisco.com/en-us/press/releases/release_linksys_01072013 Announced in PR on '''Cisco'''] *[http://www.engadget.com/2013/01/07/linksys-reveals-a-trio-of-802-11ac-wifi-routers-with-beamforming/ ''Linksys reveals a trio of 802.11ac WiFi routers'' via '''EnGadget'''] *[http://ces.cnet.com/8301-34439_1-57562440/cisco-adds-three-more-routers-to-its-802.11ac-portfolio/ ''Cisco adds three more routers to its 802.11ac portfolio'' on '''C|NET'''] :One USB 3.0 port, One USB 2.0 port *[http://www.linksys.com/en-us/press/presskit/linkys_ea6700 Linksys press-kit for the device] :105MB TIFF of the top of the unit..
===Reviews=== *[https://experimental-engineering.co.uk/cisco-ea6700-linksys-ac1750-router/ ''Cisco EA6700 / Linksys AC1750 Router'' on '''Experimental Engineering'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4708A0 (ARM Cortex A9) (images PCB) :3x [[Skyworks]] SE5003L 5GHz power amplifier (23dBm) :3x [[Skyworks]] SE2605L 2.4GHz power amplifier (23dBm)
